room_title: Escape room "When Words Fail - Spy Escape" by Grande Royal Escape in Jacksonville
room_description:
In these uncertain times, governments are scrambling to ensure the loyalty of patriots who serve them. Great Britain is no exception. So, when nuclear codes turn up missing it becomes the mission of the OO's to investigate themselves. Starting with OO45 Agent Brimby, your colleague, and friend who the codes disappeared under.
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to infiltrate Brimby's home and determine his guilt or innocence without being detected. It's dangerous, it's of vital importance, and there's no guarantee of survival. In other words, it's just another day on the job for the world's elite covert spies.
